divs: sighting detailsall my life my wishes come true to this day? true story for 32 yrs all my wishes came true but 1 wish. for some reason i can make things happen in reality started when i was young i wished for snow in the middle of summer it was about 93 degrees and a giant snowball came outta the clear blue sky & almost knocked my head clear off had 6 friends see this happen after this i started thinking the snowball came at me so i then caught on i started wishing for things & every thing i wished for happened even to this day does anyone out there have this strange power??? i know it sounds weird & i cannot beleive im writing this but outta 1000s of wishes all but 1 didnt come true i even helped someone hit the lotto for millions am i the only 1 on earth that can do this ??? ps witches online have told me im a god which i am trying not beleive lol am i the only 1???????????? this is not a lie i wanna know who else out there can do these kinda things ps i had many encouters with ufos in the past also 1 more thing im not crazy b\c i have witnesses & when i seen the ufos 4 of them i was never alone only 1 time i seen 1 when i was alone about 5 ufos all together in my life i did have dreams being on a spaceship about 3 times once in a control room i remember it to this day & twice in a doctors office ps when i was in the doctors office the aliens looked human when i was on a space ship in a control room they were the little greys a spaceship came to the large window i was looking out of like it was observing me the lights were truley incredible it was a triangle craft sounds weird but those dreams are like a part of my life it was so real thats my true story
Summary: I know its hard to believe But my wishes always come true
